title: Cody Geoffroy
text:
I’m building a foundation in bioinformatics through hands-on problem solving and data analysis. With a background in biomedical sciences and genomics, I’m passionate about using computational approaches to understand biological systems.
Currently: Developing skills in Python, R, and bioinformatics algorithms | Solving Rosalind problems | Building analysis pipelines

title: About
text: I’m a recent graduate with a Bachelor’s in Biomedical Sciences and minors in Genomics/Bioinformatics and Anthropology. I’m currently developing my computational skills through self-directed learning in bioinformatics and data science.
